channel.title: Posts on Consulting Statistician
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Consulting Statistician

item.title: Week 30: Movie Profit
item.description: Movie Profit, Not So Profit Introduction This is my second post on Tidy Tuesday and the data-set in question is Movie profit data-set. Even though the title of data says Movie profit I am going to focus on the movies which did not generate any revenue domestic and suggest on gross in worldwide. Understand Genre and Mpaa Rating on Movies 3401 movies with 8 variables of information which include numeric and categorical.

item.title: Week 31 : R and Package Downloads
item.description: Introduction Tidy Tuesday is a very good move to improve R programming for anyone who is interested in statistics. Datasets are uploaded every tuesday, and plots are published under the #tidytuesday. This is just me presenting a few accumulated plots for the dataset r-downloads.csv and r_downloads_year.csv. I shall be focusing on the data set provided on 2018 October 30th, Which is R and Package download stats My main objective is to understand how Sri Lankan users have behaved in in this dataset.
